terminate

public void terminate()
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                      org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
undeploy a context. If the server is already stopped, this the undeployment is skipped without an error. The context field is set to null, to tell the system to skip this in future.

Specified by:
terminate in interface org.smartfrog.services.www.ApplicationServerContext
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException
